description: ERECTION OF A SINGLE STOREY REAR EXTENSION, TWO STOREY SIDE EXTENSION AND ROOF EXTENSION, INSTALLATION OF 2X ROOFLIGHTS TO THE FRONT ROOF SLOPE, INSTALLATION OF SIDE & REAR DORMER WINDOWS, FORMATION OF ON-SITE PARKING SPACE AND ASSOCIATED LANDSCAPING.
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development to which this permission relates shall be commenced not later than the expiration of 3 years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 00153-A00-000 Rev A, 00153-A00-001 Rev A, 00153-A01-000 Rev A, 00153-A01-001 Rev A, 00153-A01-002 Rev A, 00153-A01-003 Rev A, 00153-A02-000 Rev A, 00153-A02-001 Rev A, 00153-A03-000 Rev A, 00153-A03-001 Rev A, 00153-A03-002 Rev A, 00153-A03-003 Rev A, 00153-A00-101 Rev A, 00153-A01-100 Rev A, 00153-A01-101 Rev A, 00153-A01-102 Rev A, 00153-A01-003 Rev A, 00153-A02-100 Rev A, 00153-A02-101 Rev A, 00153-A03-100 Rev A, 00153-A03-101 Rev B, 00153-A03-102 Rev A, 00153-A03-103 Rev A

Condition : 3 - The facing materials to be used for the development hereby permitted shall be those specified in the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 4 - Notwithstanding the provisions of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development)(England) Order 2015 (or any order revoking and re-enacting that Order with or without modification), no window, door or other opening other than those expressly authorised by this permission shall be constructed in the side elevations without planning permission first being obtained from the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - Before the development hereby permitted is first occupied, the 1st floor bathroom window in the east elevation shall be glazed with obscure glass and fixed shut and shall permanently maintained as such thereafter.

Condition : 6 - Access to the flat roof of the development hereby permitted shall be for maintenance or emergency purposes only, and the flat roof shall not be used as a roof garden, terrace, patio or similar amenity area.

Condition : 7 - No demolition or construction work or ancillary activities such as deliveries shall take place before 8am or after 6pm Mondays - Fridays inclusive, before 8am or after 1pm on Saturdays or at any time on Sundays or Bank Holidays.

Condition : 8 - The applicant shall ensure that the silver birch, conifer and damson trees idenfitied in the proposed site plan 00154-A00-101 at the rear of the property are not removed as a result of the development and are protected at all times during the undertaking of construction work.

Condition : 9 - In accordance with paragraph 38 of the NPPF, The London Borough of Merton (LBM) takes a positive and proactive approach to development proposals focused on solutions. LBM works with applicants/agents in a positive and proactive manner by:

   i) Offering a pre-application advice and duty desk service. 
   ii) Where possible, suggesting solutions to secure a successful outcome.
   iii) As appropriate, updating applicants/agents of any issues that may arise in the processing of their application.

In this instance:

   i) The applicant/agent was provided with pre-application advice.
   ii) Amended plans were submitted so that the scheme was approved.
   iii) An extension of time until 05/02/2020 was agreed with the applicant.
